Package org.kiji.mapreduce.lib.produce

Producers for Kiji MapReduce.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AllVersionsSingleInputProducer Base class for producers that read all versions from a single input column.
ConfiguredRegexProducer A regex producer that is ready to use "out of the box." All you need to do is specify a couple of configuration values.
IdentityProducer This producer copies data from one family or column to another without modification.
RegexProducer A producer which uses a full regular expression match on a string input column to generate a new column.
SingleInputProducer Base class for producers that read from the most recent value of a single input column.
 

Package org.kiji.mapreduce.lib.produce Description

Producers for Kiji MapReduce.

A KijiProducer executes a function over a subset of the columns in a table row and produces output to be injected back into a column of that row. Produce jobs which execute the producer over all rows in the table can be created using the KijiProduceJobBuilder. Producers can be invoked using the kiji produce tool.

Usable producers:

  • ConfiguredRegexProducer - extracts data via regex.
  • IdentityProducer - copies data from one family or column to another.
